DocWhereRule.Name: HasName
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Name attribute has to be provided for IfcProject. It is the short name for the project.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectContext
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If a RepresentationContexts relation is provided then there shall be no instance of IfcGeometricRepresentationSubContext directly included in the set of RepresentationContexts.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoDecomposition
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The IfcProject represents the root of the any decomposition tree. It shall therefore not be used to decompose any other object definition.
